titles: A short examination of A Discourse concerning edification, by Dr. Hascard where it is inquired, how well the author of the said discourse hath proved that it is not lawful for a man to go from his parish church to meetings, that he might be better edifie [sic] / in a letter to a friend.
author: Hody, Humphrey, 1659-1707.
publisher: Printed and are to be sold by A. Baldwin,
notes: Attributed by Wing to Humphry Hody.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
keywords: Hascard, Gregory. --  A discourse about edification.
